ROOT.QUERY: SELECT DISTINCT to_char(cfidate,''MM/DD/RR'') "Invoice date", cfiinvid "Invoice #", foucnuf || '' '' || foulibl "Supplier code desc.", cfimfac, ''The deals for this supplier has not been set correctly in MDM.'' "Comment" FROM intcfremise@heinens_custom_prod, foudgene@heinens_custom_prod, intcfinv@heinens_custom_prod WHERE cfrinvid=cfiinvid AND cfrcfex=cficfex AND cficfin=foucfin AND cfrunit = 2 AND cfrunar IS NULL AND TRUNC(cfidate)>=TRUNC(SYSDATE-14) ORDER BY "Invoice date" DESC
ROOT.HEADERIFEMPTY: No issue EDI discount unit missing
ROOT.HEADER: EDI Auto generated invoice - Missing Discount unit
